trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as catalogs.
trans-unit.target: 用作充当目录的所有区域控件的基类。

trans-unit.source: Catalogs contain lists of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls that users can add to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 目录包含列表<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>用户可添加到网页上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The CatalogZoneBase class is a base class that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class.
trans-unit.target: CatalogZoneBase 类是从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>继承的基类

trans-unit.source: It provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones.
trans-unit.target: 它的派生区域提供了一组基本的行为。

trans-unit.source: The CatalogZoneBase class provides a unique user interface (UI) that enables users to add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls to Web pages.
trans-unit.target: CatalogZoneBase 类提供唯一的用户界面 (UI)，使用户能够添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和其他服务器控件添加到网页。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Controls that derive from the CatalogZoneBase class, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, are the controls actually placed on Web pages.
trans-unit.target: 控件派生自 CatalogZoneBase 类中，诸如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>，是实际放置在网页的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: They act as containers for other controls, known as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, that create lists of server controls for users to add to a page.
trans-unit.target: 它们作为容器的其他控件，称为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，创建的用户添加到页上的服务器控件的列表。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: Zones that derive from the CatalogZoneBase class can appear only when the page is in catalog display mode.
trans-unit.target: 仅页位于目录的显示模式中，可以会出现从 CatalogZoneBase 类派生的区域。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A CatalogZoneBase zone can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, and conversely, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls can reside only in CatalogZoneBase zones.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> CatalogZoneBase 区域只能包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，并与此相反，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件可以仅位于 CatalogZoneBase 区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The mechanism for adding server controls to a catalog is the following set of three controls that derive from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> class.
trans-unit.target: 将服务器控件添加到目录的机制是以下一组三个控件派生自基的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: |Control|Description| |-------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>|Maintains references to controls that have been closed on a page.
trans-unit.target: |控制 |说明 | |-------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>|维护对已关闭在页面上的控件的引用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls can be reopened (added back to the page) by users.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>|Contains references to controls that are declared in a Web Parts catalog in the markup of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 这些控件可以重新打开 （重新添加到页） 的用户。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>|包含对在网页上的标记中的 Web 部件目录中声明的控件的引用。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: These controls can be added to a Web page by users.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>|Provides the UI for a user to upload a definition file to a catalog so that the control can be added to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 这些控件可以由用户添加到网页上。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>|提供用户界面，用户将定义文件上载到目录，以便该控件可以添加到网页。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: Definition files are XML file with a .WebPart file name extension that import settings for a control.
trans-unit.target: 定义文件是具有的 XML 文件。导入控制的设置的 web 部件文件名称扩展。

trans-unit.source: The control must be present on the server before the definition file can be imported.| The CatalogZoneBase class has a number of properties that are useful for displaying catalogs of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 该控件才能导入定义文件必须存在于服务器上。 | CatalogZoneBase 类具有多个属性，可用于显示的目录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A> property references the verb that adds a selected control from the catalog to the page, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> property references a verb that closes the catalog and returns the page's display mode to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A>属性引用将所选的控件从目录添加到页上，该谓词时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>属性引用的谓词可关闭目录并返回该页面的显示模式，若要浏览模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.AddVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> property references the collection of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>属性引用的所有集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Several text-oriented properties, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>, override base properties to provide default text appropriate for catalogs.
trans-unit.target: 多个面向文本的属性，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A>，重写基属性以提供适用于目录的默认文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InstructionText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A> property contains the text alongside the drop-down list control that allows users to choose which zone a control will be added to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A>属性包含允许用户选择控件的区域将添加到下拉列表控件旁边的文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectTargetZoneText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Several other properties are included in the CatalogZoneBase class.
trans-unit.target: 多个其他属性都将纳入 CatalogZoneBase 类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> property is a unique string identifier for the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>属性是当前所选的唯一字符串标识符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.ShowCatalogIcons%2A> property indicates whether to show the icons that can be associated with controls by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.ShowCatalogIcons%2A>属性指示是否显示可通过设置与控件关联的图标<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.ShowCatalogIcons%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> property contains style attributes for the links to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls that are not currently selected in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>属性包含此链接到的样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>在区域中当前未选择的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> property contains style attributes for a link to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control that the user has currently selected in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>属性包含样式特性提供了指向链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>用户当前选定的区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the properties, there are also some methods in the CatalogZoneBase class, in addition to the standard event-handling and rendering methods inherited from other base controls, which are uniquely designed for the purpose of handling catalogs of controls.
trans-unit.target: 除了属性外，也有一些方法在 CatalogZoneBase 类中，除了标准的事件处理和呈现方法继承自其他基控件，经过专门设计用于处理的控件目录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A> method creates the chrome (peripheral UI elements such as a border, verbs, icons, and a title) that surrounds each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control in the zone, and also handles the rendering for the controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A>方法创建 chrome （即外围 UI 元素，如边框、 谓词、 图标和标题） 环绕每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>的区域中的控件，同时也处理控件的呈现。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> method is an abstract method; derived classes override it to create instances of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>方法是一个抽象方法; 派生的类重写它创建的所有实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>该区域中包含的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InvalidateCatalogParts%2A> method can be called by a derived class if the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the zone changes for some programmatic reason, and the derived class needs to recreate the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InvalidateCatalogParts%2A>如果，可以由派生类调用方法的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域的变化某种编程的原因，以及派生的类中的控件需要重新创建该集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.InvalidateCatalogParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A> method loads the previously existing state for the check boxes next to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the catalog, whenever the page is posted back to the server; conversely, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveControlState%2A> method saves the state of the check boxes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A>方法加载以前现有状态复选框旁边<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件在目录中，每当页回发到服务器; 相反，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveControlState%2A>方法保存的复选框的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SaveControlState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderCatalogPartLinks%2A> method provides all the rendering for the links to each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 最后，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderCatalogPartLinks%2A>方法提供给每个链接的所有呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>该区域中包含的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderCatalogPartLinks%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化继承的类实例使用的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

trans-unit.source: The constructor is called when a derived class is initialized, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> class provided with the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 初始化派生的类时，如调用的构造函数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>Web 部件控件集提供的类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: The base CatalogZoneBase constructor helps prepare the page to display the Web Parts catalog user interface (UI), by passing the appropriate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control.
trans-unit.target: 基 CatalogZoneBase 构造函数可帮助准备页后，可以显示 Web 部件目录用户界面 (UI)，通过传递相应<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>对象传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the constructor passes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> object.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，构造函数传递<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to add controls from a catalog to a Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>使最终用户能够将控件从目录添加到 Web 部件页的对象。

trans-unit.source: The add verb is referenced by the AddVerb property on a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 添加谓词引用由从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>派生的控件的 AddVerb 属性

trans-unit.source: The add verb adds a control that an end user has selected in the catalog to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: 添加谓词添加到网页上目录中选择了最终用户控件。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the add verb appears in the user interface (UI) as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control, although it can also be a link or an image.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，添加谓词显示在用户界面 (UI) 中为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件，但它也可以是一个链接或图像。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: The add verb is a zone-level control, meaning that although there might be several <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the catalog, the add verb applies to all the controls selected by the user and adds them to the selected zone.
trans-unit.target: 添加谓词是区域级别的控件，这意味着，尽管可能存在多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>在目录中的控件，添加谓词应用于由用户选择的所有控件，并将它们添加到所选区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to add controls from the catalog to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> ，使最终用户可以将控件从该目录添加到 Web 页。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome"></xref> class associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取到的实例的引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome"></xref>与关联的类<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref>区域。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A> method is called, it creates one instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> class, and this instance is used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements (also called the chrome) for all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A>方法被调用时，它将创建的一个实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome>类与此实例用于所有呈现外围设备的用户界面 (UI) 元素 （也称为 chrome）<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogPartChrome%2A>

trans-unit.source: The chrome elements for an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control include its border and title text.
trans-unit.target: 个人的 chrome 元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件包括其边框和标题文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls provided with the Web Parts control set do not have header verbs by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>Web 部件控件集提供的控件在默认情况下没有标头谓词。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome"></xref> that is associated with the zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome"> </xref>区域与该键相关联。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of all the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> controls contained in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取所有的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref>中包含的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref>区域。

trans-unit.source: The CatalogParts property provides a reference to a collection of all the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: CatalogParts 属性提供对所有的集合的引用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: It references both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and any custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls that are added to the zone.
trans-unit.target: 它引用同时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>附带 Web 部件控件集，以及任何自定义控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件添加到的区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The collection is initially created when another method accesses the CatalogParts property, and the property calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 集合在最初创建当另一种方法访问 CatalogParts 属性，并且属性调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Note that any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> that is added to the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in an implementation of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the CatalogParts property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 请注意对任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>，它将添加到的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>的实现中的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>方法必须具有分配给其 ID 属性的值，否则将集合分配给 CatalogParts 属性时引发异常。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection"></xref> that contains all the individual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection"> </xref> ，其中包含所有单个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> being added to the collection did not have a value assigned to its ID property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"> </xref>添加到集合没有分配给其 ID 属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Switches the Web page from catalog display mode to normal browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 切换到正常浏览模式 Web 页从目录的显示模式。

trans-unit.source: The Close method ignores any currently selected controls in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: Close 方法将忽略在目录中的任何当前所选的控件。

trans-unit.source: It simply calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control to return the Web page to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 它只需调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>控件来返回到浏览模式的 Web 页。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to close the catalog user interface (UI) and return the page to normal browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>使最终用户能够关闭目录用户界面 (UI) 并返回到正常浏览模式的页的对象。

trans-unit.source: The close verb is referenced by the CloseVerb property on a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: 关闭谓词引用由从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>派生的控件的 CloseVerb 属性

trans-unit.source: User can click the close verb in the zone footer.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以单击区域页脚中的关闭谓词。

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the close verb, any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls the user has selected are ignored, the catalog UI closes, and the page returns to normal browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击关闭谓词，任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>用户选定的控件将被忽略，将关闭目录 UI，并且将页返回到正常浏览模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The close verb is a zone-level control, meaning that its action applies at the level of the whole zone.
trans-unit.target: 关闭谓词是区域级别的控件，这意味着其操作适用的整个区域的级别。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the close verb, any controls that have been selected but not added to the page are ignored, the catalog is closed, and the page returns to browse mode.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击关闭谓词时，将忽略已选择但不是添加到页面的任何控件、 关闭目录时，和页返回到浏览模式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to close the catalog UI on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> ，使最终用户可以关闭目录用户界面在网页上。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome"></xref> object used to render the peripheral user interface (UI) elements for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 创建的实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome"></xref>对象用于呈现外围设备的用户界面 (UI) 元素<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateCatalogPartChrome method returns a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> object.
trans-unit.target: CreateCatalogPartChrome 方法返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: The chrome elements for an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control include its border and title text.
trans-unit.target: 个人的 chrome 元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件包括其边框和标题文本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls provided with the Web Parts control set do not have header verbs by default.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>Web 部件控件集提供的控件在默认情况下没有标头谓词。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: However, it is possible to set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control, so that you can minimize and restore the control programmatically if needed.
trans-unit.target: 但是，很可能设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制，以便可以最小化，还可以根据需要以编程方式还原的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome"></xref> that renders the peripheral UI elements for the zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome"> </xref>呈现该区域的外围 UI 元素。

trans-unit.source: Provides a base method declaration that derived zones can override to handle the details of creating the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 提供可以重写基方法声明派生区域以处理创建的详细信息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref>区域中包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateCatalogParts method provides no implementation.
trans-unit.target: CreateCatalogParts 方法不提供任何实现。

trans-unit.source: It is intended to be implemented in a derived class, and should be used to create an instance of the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls contained in a zone, whenever the hosting Web page enters catalog mode.
trans-unit.target: 它旨在实现在派生类中，并应该用于创建的集合的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>承载网页进入目录模式时，在区域中，包含的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone.CreateCatalogParts%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method provides one example of an implementation of the CreateCatalogParts method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone.CreateCatalogParts%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法提供的 CreateCatalogParts 方法的实现的一个示例。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone.CreateCatalogParts%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Note that any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> that is added to the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in an implementation of the CreateCatalogParts method must have a value assigned to its ID property, otherwise an exception will be thrown when the collection is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 请注意对任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>，它将添加到的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>CreateCatalogParts 方法的实现中的控件必须具有分配给其 ID 属性的值，否则将集合分配给时引发异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The method can create the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls from several sources: controls that are declared in persistence format within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> control, or controls that are persisted in various storage mechanisms, such as an XML file or a database.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可以创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>来自多个源的控件︰ 声明中的持久性格式的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>控件或将保留在不同的存储机制，如 XML 文件或数据库中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection"></xref> that contains the collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> controls associated with the zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartCollection"> </xref> ，包含的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref>与区域关联的控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of child controls associated with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 创建与关联的控件的子组<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref>区域。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a message that appears when a zone contains no controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当区域不包含任何控件时显示一条消息。

trans-unit.source: The string value of the EmptyZoneText property is displayed when a Web page enters catalog mode, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone contains no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: EmptyZoneText 属性的字符串值显示网页进入目录模式时，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域不包含任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: 包含空区域中显示的消息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 由.NET Framework 提供的默认区域性特定字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text for the header area of a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的区域的页眉区的文本。

trans-unit.source: The string value of the HeaderText property is displayed in the header area of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone, which is at the very top of the zone.
trans-unit.target: HeaderText 属性的字符串值显示在标题区域中的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域，位于该区域的最顶端。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The text of the HeaderText property is displayed when a page enters catalog mode and the catalog user interface (UI) becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: 在页面上输入目录模式和目录用户界面 (UI) 变得可见时，将显示 HeaderText 属性的文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the header text for the zone.
trans-unit.target: 包含该区域的页眉文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 由.NET Framework 提供的默认区域性特定字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text in a zone that provides directions for end users.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置为最终用户提供说明的区域中的文本。

trans-unit.source: The string value of the InstructionText property is displayed just below the header area of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: 下面的标头区显示 InstructionText 属性的字符串值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The text of the InstructionText property is displayed when a page enters catalog mode and the catalog user interface (UI) becomes visible.
trans-unit.target: 在页面上输入目录模式和目录用户界面 (UI) 变得可见时，将显示 InstructionText 属性的文本。

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the InstructionText property is to provide the user with general instructions on what to do when the catalog UI is displayed.
trans-unit.target: InstructionText 属性旨在为用户提供要执行的操作时显示目录用户界面的一般说明。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the directions for end users.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含用于最终用户的说明。

trans-unit.source: A default, culture-specific string is provided by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Web 部件控件集由提供特定于区域性的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Destroys the collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> controls associated with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 销毁的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref>与关联的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref>区域。

trans-unit.source: The InvalidateCatalogParts method can be called by derived classes if the list of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone has changed for some reason, and the derived class needs to get an updated list of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 方法可以由调用派生 InvalidateCatalogParts 类如果的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>与关联的控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>由于某种原因，更改区域，并且派生的类需要获取更新的列表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The derived class should first call InvalidateCatalogParts to destroy the current collection, and then the base class will call <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A> as needed to create the updated collection.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类应首先调用 InvalidateCatalogParts 销毁当前集合中，，然后将调用的基类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>根据需要创建已更新的收集。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CreateCatalogParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Loads the state from a previous page request for control properties that should persist across postbacks even when view state is disabled on the control.
trans-unit.target: 在控件上禁用了视图状态的情况下，即使在回发期间应保留的控件属性的一个页面请求从加载的状态。

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: 以前保存的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: savedState is not a valid control state.
trans-unit.target: savedState不是有效的控件状态。

trans-unit.source: Processes the state of the check boxes that correspond to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in the catalog, when the page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 进程的对应复选框状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>在目录中，页回发到服务器时的控件。

trans-unit.source: This method iterates through the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> controls to determine which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls in the catalog have been selected by a user.
trans-unit.target: 此方法循环访问集合的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>控件来确定哪些<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或已由用户选择在目录中的其他服务器控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The selected items are assigned to an internal array, which is then processed to add the corresponding controls to the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 所选的项分配给一个内部的数组，然后处理以将相应的控件添加到 Web 页。

trans-unit.source: The method is not designed to be called from your code; it is used internally by the Web Parts control set.
trans-unit.target: 该方法不是从你的代码; 调用它由 Web 部件控件集在内部使用。

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: The collection of name/value pairs posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 发布到服务器的名称/值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: This method, in contrast to the overridden base method, always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, because the class does not expose any change event.
trans-unit.target: 此方法，与重写基方法，始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，因为类不公开任何更改事件。

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的区域的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, you can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method first calls the base method to load any previously existing state information.
trans-unit.target: LoadViewState 方法首先调用基方法，以加载任何先前存在的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: Next, it adds the view-state data object containing the state information for the add verb, the close verb, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> object, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，它还将包含添加谓词，关闭谓词的状态信息的视图状态数据对象添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>对象，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state data.
trans-unit.target: 以前保存的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: The size of the savedState object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.
trans-unit.target: 大小 savedState 对象不等于当前的视图状态对象的大小。

trans-unit.source: Registers the page object so that the page requires control state.
trans-unit.target: 注册的 page 对象，以便的页面要求控件状态。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event and registers the page object so that it requires postbacks.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref>事件并注册页面对象，以便让它需要回发。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains style attributes for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> controls that are not currently selected in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，包含的样式特性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref>在区域中当前未选择的控件。

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone, links are displayed for each type of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域，为每种类型的显示链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件︰ <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks one of the links, the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control becomes the selected control, and the child controls contained by that selected control become visible.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击相应的链接之一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件变为所选的控件，并包含该所选控件的子控件使其可见。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object referenced by the PartLinkStyle property contains the style attributes for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls that are not currently selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>PartLinkStyle 属性引用的对象包含的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>当前未选择的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: Although the object referenced by the property is read-only, you can still use it to set the underlying style characteristics for the unselected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该属性引用的对象是只读的但仍可以使用以设置未选定的基础样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for the controls that are not currently selected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> ，其中包含当前未选择的控件的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: Carries out the actions associated with one of the zone verbs, or raises an event that posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 执行与某一区域谓词时，关联的操作或引发一个事件，回发到服务器。

trans-unit.source: If the `eventArgument` parameter data indicates that the add verb or the close verb was clicked, then the RaisePostBackEvent method carries out the action associated with the verb, such as adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls to the page, or closing the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 如果`eventArgument`参数数据指示被单击的添加谓词或关闭的谓词，则 RaisePostBackEvent 方法执行与该谓词，例如添加关联的操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件添加到页上，或关闭目录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the method is being called for any other reason, then the base method is invoked to raise a postback event to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果出于任何其他原因调用方法时，然后调用基方法引发到服务器的回发事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含事件参数。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Renders the zone to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 将为指定区域呈现<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.Render%2A> method overrides the base method from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> class to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.VerifyRenderingInServerForm%2A> method, which verifies that an HTML form is rendered for the zone control at run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.Render%2A>方法重写基方法从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl>类来调用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.VerifyRenderingInServerForm%2A>方法，验证是否在运行时以 HTML 形式呈现为区域控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.VerifyRenderingInServerForm%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the verification, the method then renders the remaining contents of the zone.
trans-unit.target: 验证之后，该方法随后将呈现该区域的其余内容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the zone's content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>接收区域的内容。

trans-unit.source: Overrides the base method to render the body area of a zone derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 重写基方法，以呈现派生自的区域的正文区<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The RenderBody method renders the body area of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone, which is the main content area between the header and footer areas and contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 该 RenderBody 方法将呈现的正文区，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域，也不能是页眉和页脚区域之间的主要内容区域包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The RenderBody method overrides the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class to provide specialized rendering that addresses layout and style attributes that apply only to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: RenderBody 方法重写中的基方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>类以提供地址布局和样式的专用的呈现属性仅适用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The method renders a table that contains the entire contents of the body, and within that table, it sets different attribute values depending on various conditions, including how many <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls are in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 该方法将呈现包含正文的全部内容的表并在该表中，设置不同的属性值，具体取决于各种条件，包括多少<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件是在区域中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, a link is created for each control, and only the contents of the currently selected control are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果有多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，为每个控件创建的链接和显示仅当前所选控件的内容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: Special style attributes are set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogPartChrome%2A> property for the selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control versus the ones that are not currently selected.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置特殊的样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogPartChrome%2A>为所选属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制而不是当前未选择的那些。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.CatalogPartChrome%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there are no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in the zone, the RenderBody method renders the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果有任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件，该 RenderBody 方法将呈现的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorZoneBase.EmptyZoneText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the zone's body content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>接收区域的正文内容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the links to the individual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> controls in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 将链接呈现为单个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref>中控制<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref>区域。

trans-unit.source: The RenderCatalogPartLinks method renders links to the individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in a zone if there are multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: RenderCatalogPartLinks 方法呈现链接到单个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制在区域中，如果有多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The link for the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control is rendered differently so that it stands out from the unselected controls.
trans-unit.target: 当前所选链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>时呈现控件，以不同的方式，以便它从未选定控件醒目。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: Developers can set the style attributes for the selected and unselected control links by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可以通过使用设置的选定和未选定控件链接的样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>属性，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The links to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls in a zone are not navigational; they are for displaying the user interface (UI) of the controls.
trans-unit.target: 此链接到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>区域中的控件不是导航; 它们是用于显示控件的用户界面 (UI)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the link for a control, the UI for any other displayed control is hidden, and the UI for the selected control is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击的控件的链接时，将隐藏任何其他显示控件的 UI，而显示为选定控件的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the contents of the links to the zone's controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>接收的内容区域的控件的链接。

trans-unit.source: Renders the footer area for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 呈现的页脚区域<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref>区域。

trans-unit.source: The footer of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone is the bottom area of the zone that contains the zone-level verbs such as the add verb and the close verb.
trans-unit.target: 页脚<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域是包含如添加谓词和关闭的谓词的区域级别谓词的区域的底部区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: In the underlying markup, a footer is simply a cell in an HTML table.
trans-unit.target: 在基础的标记中，页脚是只需一个 HTML 表中的单元格。

trans-unit.source: The RenderFooter method first creates the style attributes for the footer, and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs%2A> method to render the add and close verbs.
trans-unit.target: RenderFooter 方法首先创建页脚，样式特性，然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs%2A>方法呈现添加并关闭谓词。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.RenderVerbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that renders the footer area for the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>呈现该区域的页脚区域。

trans-unit.source: Renders the verbs in the footer area of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: 呈现的页脚区域中的谓词<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref>区域。

trans-unit.source: The RenderVerbs method renders the add verb and the close verb within the footer area of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: RenderVerbs 方法呈现添加谓词和关闭的页脚区域中，谓词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that renders the verbs for the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>呈现该区域的谓词。

trans-unit.source: Saves any changes in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> control's state that occur after the Web page is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 保存任何更改在<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref>发生网页回发到服务器后的控件的状态。

trans-unit.source: The SaveControlState method is concerned with state data that is essential for a control's operation (such as an index or keyword) and is separate from the control's view-state data.
trans-unit.target: SaveControlState 方法关心的是必需的控件的操作 （如索引或关键字），并且独立于控件的视图状态数据的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: The method first calls the base method to save the existing state data for the control.
trans-unit.target: 该方法首先调用基方法，以保存该控件的现有状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Next, it determines whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control in the zone is currently selected, by checking whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> property has a value.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，它确定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>当前选定区域中的控件，通过检查是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A>属性具有值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedCatalogPartID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: If there is a selected control, the method updates the existing state data with the state data from the selected control, and then returns all the state data.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有选定的控件，该方法使用从所选控件的状态数据更新现有的状态数据，，然后返回所有的状态数据。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the state data for the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>包含控件的状态数据。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: If there have been no changes to the state, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果已为状态的任何更改，该方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves any view-state changes that have occurred after a page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 保存页回发到服务器后已发生任何视图状态更改。

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method calls the base method to save the view state associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: SaveViewState 方法调用基方法，以保存与关联的视图状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Next, it saves any view state for the add and close verbs, as well as for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，它将保存为添加和关闭谓词，以及任何视图状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: Returns the zone control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 返回区域控件的当前视图状态。

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the zone, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当与区域关联的视图状态时，此方法返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string as an identifier for the currently selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个字符串作为当前所选的标识符<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedCatalogPartID property allows you to set an identifier of your choice for the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: SelectedCatalogPartID 属性可以设置你选择的当前所选的标识符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: This does not change the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property value, so you can use this property for your own programmatic purposes.
trans-unit.target: 这不会更改控件的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性值，因此你可以使用此属性用于你个人编程目的。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you wanted to always carry out some programmatic action on the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control, this property enables you to access that control through a known value that you set in advance.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想始终执行上当前所选的某些编程操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控制，此属性，你可以通过提前设置一个已知值访问该控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that serves as the identifier for the currently selected control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，用作当前所选控件的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是控件的值<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID*>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that contains style attributes for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref> control that is currently selected in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，包含的样式特性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart"></xref>当前选择的区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone, links are displayed for each type of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域，为每种类型的显示链接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件︰ <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ImportCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks one of the links, the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control becomes the selected control, and the child controls contained by that selected control become visible.
trans-unit.target: 当用户单击相应的链接之一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件变为所选的控件，并包含该所选控件的子控件使其可见。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object referenced by the SelectedPartLinkStyle property contains the style attributes of the link for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control that is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>SelectedPartLinkStyle 属性引用的对象包含的链接的样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>当前选择的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: Although the object referenced by the property is read-only, you can still use it to set the underlying style characteristics for the selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 尽管该属性引用的对象是只读的但仍可以使用设置为所选的基础样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for the control that is currently selected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>包含当前所选的控件的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text alongside the control in the catalog user interface (UI) that allows users to choose which zone to add their selected controls to.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置允许用户选择哪些区域以添加到其所选的控件的目录用户界面 (UI) 中的控件旁边的文本。

trans-unit.source: When the catalog UI first appears, users can select one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> controls, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>, that contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> or other server controls that can be added to the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当第一次出现目录用户界面时，用户可以选择其中一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart>，包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>或其他服务器控件可添加到 Web 页。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: The user selects one or more controls, and can then use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control in the footer area of the catalog and choose the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> control on the page in which to place the selected server controls.
trans-unit.target: 用户选择一个或多个控件，并可以然后使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控制该目录的页脚区域中并选择<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>在其中放置所选的服务器控件的页上的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>

trans-unit.source: The text value of the SelectTargetZoneText property is displayed alongside the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control as a simple instruction.
trans-unit.target: 旁显示 SelectTargetZoneText 属性的文本值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件作为简单的指令。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text to display alongside the zone selection control.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，包含要显示的区域选择控件旁边的文本。

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 由.NET Framework 提供的默认区域性特定字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether server controls in the catalog display their associated icons in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指示是否在目录中的服务器控件显示及其相关的图标显示在目录中。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and other server controls that are wrapped as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart> controls at run time have a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和包装为其他服务器控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart>控件在运行时具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.CatalogIconImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is the URL to an image that is used as an icon to represent the control in a catalog of controls.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值是对用作一个图标来表示控件的目录中的控件的图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The ShowCatalogIcons property indicates whether the icons associated with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> and other server controls are displayed in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: ShowCatalogIcons 属性指示与关联的图标是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>和其他服务器控件显示在目录中。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the icons associated with server controls in the catalog should be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应显示在目录中的服务器控件与关联的图标;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData*> method of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法通过调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData*>方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase"></xref>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The method simply calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> class, which in turn processes the state of the check boxes in a catalog that correspond to server controls in the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 方法只需调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>类，它会反过来处理对应于目录中的服务器控件目录中的复选框的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.LoadPostData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: The collection of name/value pairs posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 发布到服务器的名称/值对的集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an event should be raised to indicate that data has changed; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果应引发事件以指示已更改数据;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此成员的说明，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*>

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用它时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>实例被强制转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: Tracks changes to a zone control's view state.
trans-unit.target: 曲目更改为区域控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The TrackViewState method first calls the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class to track the view state associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: TrackViewState 方法首先调用基方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>与关联的类，以跟踪视图状态<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase>区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: Next, the method begins tracking the view state for the add and close verbs, as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> objects associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，该方法将开始跟踪添加和关闭谓词的视图状态以及<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.SelectedPartLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZoneBase.PartLinkStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>
